thread.title: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies
thread.title_full: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies

title: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies
text: > Top News Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies FILE - In this April 17, 1964 file photo, St. Louis Hawks coach Harry Gallatin talks with his players during a time out in first half of their final playoff game with the Warriors at the Cow Palace in San Francisco. Gallatin, a member of the National Basketball Hall of Fame, passed away at the age of 88, Southern Illinois University at Edwardsville announced, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. (AP Photo/File)
